name: Notion Procrastination Helper
description: Struggling with Procrastination? With the Procrastination Helper for Notion, you'll never have to look anywhere else for minimizing procrastination. This template features a multitude of tools and sub-templates to easily track and eliminate your procrastination including: A Procrastination Issues template for monitoring your struggles and improving on them A Cost-Benefit board for determining the worthwhileness of your task. A break-it-down tool to complete your task with less stress A habit tra
features: A Procrastination Issues template for monitoring your struggles and improving on them; A Cost-Benefit board for determining the worthwhileness of your task.; A break-it-down tool to complete your task with less stress; A habit tracker to maintaining good habits, which is key for building discipline; Multiple Minimalistic templates for your projects, notes, and journals that are simple to use; A positive thoughts tool to relish on your completed goals
